message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, it's a good start
I'll give you 40, but I want a bit more for myself this time.
I'll take most, but I'm being generous
I'll give you 30, but I'm trying to get closer to the majority now.
I'm taking control, don't you want a smaller share?
I'll give you 20, but I'm getting closer to the majority, don't you think?
I'm almost there, don't make me wait
I'll give you 10, but I'm not going to give up yet!
This is my last chance, take it or leave it
I'll give you 5, but I'm not going to let you have it all!
I'll take almost everything, it's now or never
